description:
The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu Tanjou: Kakumei Senshi Sabo no Bouken!
Die Geburt einer Legende – Die Abenteuer des Revolutionskämpfers Sabo!
La naissance de la légende. Les aventures de Sabo le guerrier révolutionnaire !
The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!
Рождение новой легенды! Приключение революционера Сабо!
ولادة أسطورة! مغامرات محارب الجيش الثّوريّ سابو!
伝説誕生 革命戦士サボの冒険!
